summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details transportation charges, discounts, and payment information, indicating a total amount due of $123.13. The invoice also includes shipment details and references multiple shipments made by Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he utilized FedEx services for shipping.

persons.name: Jeanie Erdman
persons.context: Jeanie Erdman is mentioned as a recipient of one of the shipments sent by Epstein.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein sent shipments to Jeanie Erdman, indicating a business or personal connection.

events.description: A shipment sent by Epstein was delivered on April 25, 2005.

events.title: Shipment Delivery

events.title: Shipment Delivery

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 02, 2005, and is for a total of $123.13.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sender and is associated with multiple shipments.
